Title: Copilot assisted real time data exploration (Preview)
EnhancedContent:
With this new capability, you can now use natural language to explore the live data behind your Real-Time Dashboard tiles, or in KQL tables. Simply ask questions, refine visuals, and uncover insights – all without writing a single line of query language.

## Instantly Explore Your Data

Real-Time Dashboards already help you monitor key metrics and spot anomalies as they happen. Now, with Copilot built right in, you can go a step further – ask questions directly about your data and get instant, visual answers.

![](//dataplatformblogwebfd-d3h9cbawf0h8ecgf.b01.azurefd.net/wp-content/uploads/2025/11/image-58.png)

Want to filter by region, compare timeframes, or find your top-performing products? Just type your question – for example:

- ‘Show me the average temperature by device over the last 30 minutes.’
- ‘Which regions have the highest number of delayed orders?’
- ‘Compare total sales this month versus last month.’

![](//dataplatformblogwebfd-d3h9cbawf0h8ecgf.b01.azurefd.net/wp-content/uploads/2025/11/image-57.png)

## From Insight to Action – Seamlessly

You can continue the exploration and drill through the data in a focused view where you can save your insights as a new visual (tile) on your dashboard for quick access and sharing with your team. Each saved tile stays connected to your live data – so as the data updates, your visual does too.

Prefer to adjust visuals manually? You can still use the Visual Options pane to fine-tune chart types, columns, or formatting to match your preferences.

![](//dataplatformblogwebfd-d3h9cbawf0h8ecgf.b01.azurefd.net/wp-content/uploads/2025/11/image-59.png)

## Get Started

To try Copilot-assisted exploration:

1. Open a Real-Time Dashboard in Fabric, and start chatting with your data using the Copilot pane on the right.

or

1. Use the inline Copilot prompt on any tile.

![](//dataplatformblogwebfd-d3h9cbawf0h8ecgf.b01.azurefd.net/wp-content/uploads/2025/11/image-2.jpg)

You can also try Copilot-assisted exploration from Real-Time Hub.

![](//dataplatformblogwebfd-d3h9cbawf0h8ecgf.b01.azurefd.net/wp-content/uploads/2025/11/image-60.png)

To learn more, refer to the [Explore data in Real-Time Dashboard tiles](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2339629) documentation.
